segment.source: How to Associate an Application with a License Group
segment.target: How to Associate an Application with a License Group

segment.source: How to Associate an Application with a License Group
segment.target: How to Associate an Application with a License Group

segment.source: How to Associate an Application with a License Group
segment.target: How to Associate an Application with a License Group

segment.source: You can enforce licensing restrictions on an application by associating the application with a license group in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: You can enforce licensing restrictions on an application by associating the application with a license group in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: Depending on the type of license group, you control who has access to the application and how many users can access an application at a time.
segment.target: Depending on the type of license group, you control who has access to the application and how many users can access an application at a time.

segment.source: You can also access license compliance reports for the application.
segment.target: You can also access license compliance reports for the application.

segment.source: One or more application license groups must exist for you to associate an application with a license group.
segment.target: One or more application license groups must exist for you to associate an application with a license group.

segment.source: To associate an application with a license group
segment.target: To associate an application with a license group

segment.source: In the left pane of the management console, expand the Applications node.
segment.target: In the left pane of the management console, expand the Applications node.

segment.source: Right-click the application you want to add to a license group, and choose Properties.
segment.target: Right-click the application you want to add to a license group, and choose Properties.

segment.source: On the General tab, use the Application License Group pull-down menu to choose the group.
segment.target: On the General tab, use the Application License Group pull-down menu to choose the group.

segment.source: You can alter the Properties tab of one application at a time.
segment.target: You can alter the Properties tab of one application at a time.

segment.source: How to Create an Application License Group
segment.target: How to Create an Application License Group

segment.source: How to Manage Application Licenses in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Application Licenses in the Server Management Console
